docs.lead_paragraph: Texas Democratic gubernatorial candidate Wendy Davis reveals in a new campaign memoir that she terminated two pregnancies for medical reasons in the 1990s, including one where the fetus had developed a severe brain abnormality.

headline.main: Texas' Wendy Davis Reveals Abortion in Memoir
headline.print_headline: Texas' Wendy Davis Reveals Abortion in Memoir

docs.snippet: Texas Democratic gubernatorial candidate Wendy Davis reveals in a new campaign memoir that she terminated two pregnancies for medical reasons in the 1990s, including one where the fetus had developed a severe brain abnormality.

docs.lead_paragraph: A Utah woman accused of dumping her newborn in the trash in an attempt to hide her pregnancy from her parents has been charged with attempted murder, Salt Lake County Attorney Sim Gill said Friday.

headline.main: Mom Accused of Dumping Baby in Trash Charged
headline.print_headline: Mom Accused of Dumping Baby in Trash Charged

docs.snippet: A Utah woman accused of dumping her newborn in the trash in an attempt to hide her pregnancy from her parents has been charged with attempted murder, Salt Lake County Attorney Sim Gill said Friday.

headline.main: Watching the Sun Set on the Summer Movie Season

docs.abstract: The Op-Ed columnists debate the union of church and real estate in “Love Is Strange” and explore future dystopias in “The Giver.” And one columnist pleads: Stop giving actors extra credit for playing gay.

docs.lead_paragraph: The former fiancee of Floyd Mayweather Jr. claims in a civil lawsuit that the superstar boxer beat her during their relationship and later publicly humiliated her by posting on social media a sonogram of her pregnancy and saying they broke up because she got an abortion.
docs.snippet: The former fiancee of Floyd Mayweather Jr. claims in a civil lawsuit that the superstar boxer beat her during their relationship and later publicly humiliated her by posting on social media a sonogram of her pregnancy and saying they broke up because...

docs.lead_paragraph: Boxer Floyd Mayweather Jr.'s ex-fiancee filed a lawsuit on Thursday accusing him of humiliating her after their breakup by posting online a copy of a sonogram from when she was pregnant with twins and saying she had an abortion.

headline.main: Ex-Fiancee of Boxer Floyd Mayweather Accuses Him of Online Humiliation
headline.print_headline: Ex-Fiancee of Boxer Floyd Mayweather Accuses Him of Online Humiliation

docs.snippet: Boxer Floyd Mayweather Jr.'s ex-fiancee filed a lawsuit on Thursday accusing him of humiliating her after their breakup by posting online a copy of a sonogram from when she was pregnant with twins and saying she had an abortion.

headline.main: A Book Bound in Human Skin? Sorry, Not This Time.
headline.print_headline: Bound in Human Skin? Sorry, Not This Time.

docs.abstract: A book at Juniata College in Pennsylvania believed to be bound in human skin turns out to have been bound in sheepskin.
